item.title: go 类型转换与断言
item.author: darcy
item.description: 断言—接口断言为确定类型 1 2 var greeting interface{} = "hello world" greetingStr := greeting.(string) 类型转换—底层结构一致的类型相互转换 1 2 greeting := []byte("hello world") greetingStr := string(greeting)
